breakingChanges: API changed from sync to async
2.0.0.migrationNotes: Update webhook handler to verify signatures using constructEvent(). All Stripe API calls now return Promises.

2.1.0.migrationNotes: Added support for Stripe Tax and improved error handling. No breaking changes.

breakingChanges: Dropped support for legacy completions API
2.0.0.migrationNotes: Migrate all completion calls to use the Chat Completions API. Use gpt-3.5-turbo or gpt-4 instead of text-davinci models.

breakingChanges: Auth methods renamed: signIn() to signInWithPassword()
2.0.0.migrationNotes: Update all auth calls to use new method names. Review realtime subscription syntax for channel-based API.

1.1.0.migrationNotes: Added organization support and improved middleware configuration.

1.2.0.migrationNotes: Added support for custom claims and improved session handling.

1.1.0.migrationNotes: Added support for MongoDB 6.0 features and improved connection pooling.
Added support for dynamic templates v2 and improved error messages.
